
## Velocity

```{r velocity, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
v1 = read_v(file1, type1)
v2 = read_v(file2, type2)
v.diff = diff_v(v1, v2)
v.rmse.station = rmse_v(v.diff, "Station")
v.rmse.time = rmse_v(v.diff, "Time")

v.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_v) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Velocity Differences at Stations")
v.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_v) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Velocity RMSE at Stations")
v.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_v) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Velocity RMSE Through Time")
```
